description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Somewhere off the coast of Bahiá de los Muertos, a Horde of Zombie Snails is about to attack.  Luckily for mankind, the rogue scientist Calypso DaVinci is frantically putting the finishing touches on his latest invention – the Torpedo Slingshot!  Now, the only thing standing between us and slow, slippery annihilation is a crazy old man and his greatest achievement.
description.short: Somewhere off the coast of Bahiá de los Muertos, a Horde of Zombie Snails is about to attack.  Luckily for mankind, the rogue scientist Calypso DaVinci is frantically putting the finishing touches on his latest invention – the Torpedo Slingshot!  Now, the only thing standing between us and slow, slippery annihilation is a crazy old man and his greatest achievement.
